name: RulesoftheRichest
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: With Rules of the Richest, you hear first hand what the multimillionaires and billionaires learned on their journey to success. This daily flash briefing will allow you to not make the same mistakes as they did. From the richest man alive Jeff Bezos to some of the smartest to ever live like Stephen Hawking. We play the quotes and let you decide for yourself what it means and how it will affect your professional and social world.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
